channel.title: [PI] Webclient Issues
channel.description:
I am still having major troubles with this damn webclient.
I am able to get past the point where the cache is downloaded, and after that, I get the requesting title screen error. Here is the cache folder after the download in the C: Drive...
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/3129wdy.png[/img]
Does anyone know my problem?

item.title: [PI] Webclient Issues
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

Thanks Rene. From looking at his tutorial, i see I did something wrong with the cache zipping. I’m going to see if that was the problem, and i assume it was. I’ll edit this post soon to let you know if it helped.

EDIT: I followed that tutorial, and I no longer have the requesting title screen error, getting the black screen “Sorry an error has occurred” error.
Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Webclient Issues
item.dc:creator: @Rene_eats_waffl3z Rene eats waffl3z
item.description:
@Rene_eats_waffl3z wrote:

Just follow Muroth’s tutorial on webclients exactly, You won’t get any errors.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Webclient Issues
item.dc:creator: @Qbix Qbix
item.description:
@Qbix wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”]It’s having a problem unzipping the cache.

Make sure you zipped the cache contents, not the folder.[/quote]

This is what I am zipping, let me know if it is correct.

Read full topic
